profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs
products: Interior Painting,Exterior Painting,Residential Painting and Commercial Painting,Staircase refinishing, Condo or Apartment Renovations and Handyman Services, Kitchen Design and Build, Home Additions, Structural work, Garage Design and Build, Basement Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Basement Underpinning and Waterproofing,Custom Cabinetry, Flooring Installation including, Laminate, Hardwood, Engineered, Tiles, Including Porcelain, marble and granite. We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.
services: House Painters, Office Painting, Exterior Painting, Residential Painting, Wallpaper Installation & Removal, Stucco Removal, Drywall Installation and Plaster repairs, Paint & Wallpaper Retailer save up to 50% off, Demolition, Rough and Finished Carpentry, Home and Renovation advisors, Kitchen Planning and Design, Handyman and Painter for a Day Services, Deck Design and Build, Basement renovations, general contractors
brands: Benjamin Moore, Dulux Paint, and Sherwin Williams. We Believe in not Including Paint and providing you our wholesale Paint Pricing as many of our Competitors include paint in your pricing and then substitute low grade paint. We believe in provide you the best paint for your home and to provide access to our unbelievable wholesale pricing.
specialities: Custom painting, Stucco removal, staircase refinishing and rebuilding,wallpaper installation, wallpaper removal, handyman services, home renovations including bathroom renovations, basement renovations & condo and apartment renovations. Plus our Award Winning Painter and Handyman for a Day Services. Our Painting Services including Kitchen Cabinet Painting and Spraying are specialties. Kitchen Design Services and Complete Kitchen Design, Build and Installation.
payment_method: Cash, Cheques, Email Transfers, all Major Credit Cards
diplomas: Open 7 Days a Week Call  or emailNow

profile:
At Delco Windows and Doors we understand that your home is your biggest investment, so when its time to renovate your home only the best will do.
 
We specialize in the replacement and installation of vinyl windows, steel and fiberglass doors, patio and storm doors and porch enclosures in Toronto and the entire GTA.
We are factory-direct, eliminating the middleman so that we can provide the most competitive pricing available. We provide the finest products using the latest machinery, craftsmanship and technologies. Our products have some of the best warranties available including the lifetime transferrable warranty. Whether you are looking for vinyl windows, a beautiful fiberglass front door or an efficient patio door you will get the best value for your buck, installed by our quality installers with many years of experience and customer service that is second to none.
 
Giving customers more value for their money, providing excellent customer service and quality reliable products has been our winning formula for many years and we look forward to continue to service our valued customers for many more.

profile:
COVID 19 UPDATE:We are open for business and can schedule virtual meetings, calls and phone calls at your convenience. We are following all the health and safety measures as directed by the Province of Ontario. We are committed to ensuring the safety of our employees and customers. 


****

Heritage Home Design is a full-service windows and doors installation company that wants to make your new or existing home look beautiful from the ground up. Working with our unique collection of classically-styled windows and doors, we install the right product for the right space, ensuring that your home looks perfect, while also making it more energy efficient. From your garage, front door, and patio doors to your bedroom, living, dining and bay windows, we offer a unique line of stunning products that will not only make your house look great, but will also keep you cooler in the summer, and warmer in the winter.

***
 
Plus, all of our windows and doors come with a double lifetime warranty. Our manufacturer offers a lifetime warranty on all of our windows and doors, and Heritage Home Design provides a quality installation warranty for the life of your home. Financing is available and all major credit cards are accepted.
products: Windows, Doors, Garage Doors, and  Railings.
services: Replacement, installation, Widening and repairs of Doors & Windows as well as minor to extensive Renovations.
payment_method: Cheques & All Major Credit Cards Accepted
warranty_terms: Limited Life Time Warranty against defects in materials & installation.

profile: Tailored Contracting is a home improvement company servicing most of the southern GTA. Our projects range from handyman services to flooring, door and trim installations to bathroom, basement and kitchen renovations to full home/condominium and commercial renovations. We Specialize in Bathroom Renovation, Basement renovation, Bathroom Remodeling, and Kitchen Renovations. All finish and trim carpentry such as, crown molding, baseboards, door installations, casing, wainscoting, drywall, and taping. We undertake work in all budget ranges while providing top quality work with hopes to exceed your expectations. We commit to completing your project in an organized, professional manner. We take pride in tailoring our services to your needs. Our personal expectations demand quality and insured work, completed on time. Do not hesitate to contact us for any questions. Contact us today to schedule your appointment.

We also aim to prove our quality skills, fair prices and customer care, so that we continue our business relationship for many years, beyond the first job we complete.

Renoex Inc is a full service General Contractors Toronto (GTA), Ontario

Our job is to arrange the best trade workers. They complete your projects with the highest quality and within the allotted time. 
We provide highly competitive prices to our clients.
Renoex Inc company provides general contracting services in Toronto (GTA). 

We serve residential and commercial properties. 
Moreover, we include home improvement, house renovation, bathroom remodeling, kitchen remodeling, finish basement. 
Additionally, we use the latest innovations and technology in the construction industry. 

Consequently, you can rely on our experts to design the plan for the renovation of home or offices. 
We work hard in making your ideas come to life. 
Our designers work with your wishes and expectations. 

Consequently, provides helpful hints and suggestions. 
Our priority is to accommodate a unique and modern look to your home or workplace.

All construction projects in Toronto (GTA), whether big or small, need to be managed effectively.

profile:
I’m Bryan Smit, and I run this business with my family and close friends. I have been working as a carpenter for eight years in the Greater Toronto Hamilton Area, but have a lifetime of experience in home renovations and the skilled trades.
 
Both of my grandfathers built new lives for their families in Canada as tradesmen—one as a plumber, and one as a mechanic and handyman. As active members in the Dutch community in Southern Ontario, both quickly became known as reliable and skilled labourers always willing to help out with anything from a clogged toilet to a full renovation. That dedication to quality work, that love for working with your hands and providing for your family and the families in your community, has been passed down in my family for generations. My father is a plumber; my brother is a welder; my uncles and cousins work in construction and woodworking; and we always come together when one of us has a project, whether it’s redoing a roof, building a shed, or renovating a bathroom. Combined, we have over 200 years of building, renovation, and repair experience.
 
From a very young age, my parents involved my siblings and me in the family projects, and they instilled in me a passion for constructing something, for the accuracy and attention to detail required, for the feeling of contributing to what makes a family’s house a home.
 
From basements to bedrooms to backyards, Bryan Smit’s Carpentry will help make your house the home your family dreamed of.
 
All of our work is fully bonded and insured.

Follow us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/bryansmitcarpentry/
name: Bryan Smit's Carpentry

profile:
Welcome to Kinben Collective. Based in Toronto, Canada, we are a general contracting company built up by a team of skilled tradesmen focused on bringing superb craftsmanship and innovative services & solutions to the architecture & construction industry. We are experienced in both residential renovations/remodelling as well as commercial projects!

Brief description of services that we offer:

- Kitchen/Bathroom/Closet renovations, remodelling & installations
- Full residential home improvements and construction renovations
- Window, Door, Crown Molding & Baseboard installations
- Professional-grade Painting services
- Flooring, Tiling, Carpet installation
- Deck/Patio builds & renovation
- Concrete/Masonry, Electrical, Plumbing & HVAC services also are also offered and are serviced to our certified, professional teams

While following Co-Vid 19 restrictions and policies (Social distancing, wearing of masks & gloves, hand sanitizer, etc.), we offer free in-person quotes. As well as over the phone or video calls. Please contact us via e-mail at kinbencollective@gmail.com or you can contact us at (647)-221-6323 for any inquiries or questions!

profile:
We are specialized in the production of fine kitchen cabinets, custom shelving, and high-end closet storage solutions . We are confident in the products we make, as well as the services we provide, on every project will suit your vision.

20 years of experience
Our 20 years of experience led to remodeling any kitchen, wall unit, home office, or walk-in closet style you like

Whether meeting with you and your family or collaborating with architects, contractors, and interior decorators, we’re here to help you define your scope of work and articulate a vision that’s uniquely yours.


The experienced design team will turn your vision into a reality detailed plan, creating custom solutions that blend form a function to fit all your family’s needs.

Build
Our designs of combining the old and the new world approach to the top of craftsmanship and that mean you can have the best rich design from both worlds for kitchens or bathrooms. We make every piece of cabinetry in our shop in Toronto, Proudly 100% Canadian-made. To this regard, we offer a warranty against defects in materials and/or workmanship for a period of two years under average residential usage.  

Our Values
We believe in building durable and functional cabinetry that will make things easy to store, easy to find, and easy to clean. By choosing to work with us you will get the real value for your investment and your cabinets will look as good up close as they do from a distance.

profile:
Focused on our customers, we provide excellent service - always answering your phone calls and responding. We focus on high quality workmanship, always looking to give our customers that 10/10 experience. No matter your project, big or small - call us and talk! We love to hear your ideas and tell you how we can make it a reality.

Since starting out in 2013, Genassy Construction has built and continues to grow a loyal customer base. Our steady repeat business has been based on a simple business philosophy: Be Trustworthy, Have Great Workmanship

Home Renovations are challenging, so it's important to know that you can depend on your contractor from start to finish. Genassy Construction focuses on crafting high quality kitchens, bathrooms, and basements.

With an army of skilled tradesmen, we can handle any job. It is our goal to consistently exceed your expectations.
